text: @PressSec Herman Cain made a choice not to wear a mask backing up your boss. Looking back I imagine he regrets that decision, oh wait he can't he is dead because he trusted a lunatic like tRump. How many more Republicans have gotten Covid-19 and are willing to die following tRump?
